# Building a document-based app using SwiftData

**Sample Code**

Code along with the WWDC presenter to transform an app with SwiftData.

## Overview

Learn how to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftData/Query], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Bindable], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/View/modelContainer(_:)], the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/modelContext] environment variable, and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/DocumentGroup] to integrate with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftData] framework.



## Creating a document

- **Building a document-based app with SwiftUI**: Create, save, and open documents in a multiplatform app.
- **DocumentGroup**: A scene that enables support for opening, creating, and saving documents.
